Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.SingleGame

Class SingleGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.model.SingleGame.SingleGame
public class SingleGame
extends Game
this attribute represent the single game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SingleGame​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> nicknames)
    this is the constructor of the class, it initialize the three boolean of vatican report at false; set the nickname of players; initialize randomly MarbleMarket and CardsMarket, create all leaderCards and assign four of them at the player, then initialize lorenzoIlMagnifico and all the soloTokens (7) in random order

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFaithPointsExceptTo​(RealPlayer actualPlayer, int toAdd)
    this method is used to add faithPoints to LorenzoIlMagnifico
    void buyCard​(int level, CardColor color, int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse)
    like in the superclass but at the end it calls checkEndGame to end the game immediately if it needs to be ended
    void checkEndGame()
    this method verifies if the there are the conditions to end the game: it checks the conditions of the superclass and furthermore and if there is a empty column in CardsMarket
    void endTurn()
    this method call the method action of the last token in the deck, if this return true it shuffles the deck else it inserts the token caught in the first position of the deck
    Player getLorenzoIlMagnifico()
    this method get a player representing lorenzo il magnifico.
    java.util.List<SoloToken> getSoloTokens()
    this method get the list of solo tokens of the game.
    java.lang.String getWinner()
    this method return the nickname of the winner.
    protected void handleVaticanReport()
    this method handle the vatican reports like in the superclass but for only the single player and lorenzoIlMagnifico.

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleGame

      public SingleGame​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> nicknames)
      this is the constructor of the class, it initialize the three boolean of vatican report at false; set the nickname of players; initialize randomly MarbleMarket and CardsMarket, create all leaderCards and assign four of them at the player, then initialize lorenzoIlMagnifico and all the soloTokens (7) in random order
      Parameters:
      nicknames - this is the nickname of the single player

  • Method Details

    • getLorenzoIlMagnifico

      public Player getLorenzoIlMagnifico()
      this method get a player representing lorenzo il magnifico. in particular, if the game is a single game, it returns the right player, it returns null otherwise
      Overrides:
      getLorenzoIlMagnifico in class Game
      Returns:
      a player representing lorenzo il magnifico

    • getSoloTokens

      public java.util.List<SoloToken> getSoloTokens()
      this method get the list of solo tokens of the game. in particular, if the game is a single game, it returns the right list, it returns null otherwise
      Overrides:
      getSoloTokens in class Game
      Returns:
      the list of solo tokens of the game

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn() throws EndGameException
      this method call the method action of the last token in the deck, if this return true it shuffles the deck else it inserts the token caught in the first position of the deck
      Overrides:
      endTurn in class Game
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty

    • checkEndGame

      public void checkEndGame() throws EndGameException
      this method verifies if the there are the conditions to end the game: it checks the conditions of the superclass and furthermore and if there is a empty column in CardsMarket
      Overrides:
      checkEndGame in class Game
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report, or a player buy more than 6 development cards, or when a column of the cardsMarket is empty

    • addFaithPointsExceptTo

      public void addFaithPointsExceptTo​(RealPlayer actualPlayer, int toAdd) throws EndGameException
      this method is used to add faithPoints to LorenzoIlMagnifico
      Overrides:
      addFaithPointsExceptTo in class Game
      Parameters:
      actualPlayer - is the single player
      toAdd - is the number of faithTrack position to add to lorenzoIlMagnifico
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report

    • buyCard

      public void buyCard​(int level, CardColor color, int position, CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse) throws EndGameException
      like in the superclass but at the end it calls checkEndGame to end the game immediately if it needs to be ended
      Overrides:
      buyCard in class Game
      Parameters:
      level - this is the level of the card to buy
      color - this is the color of the card to buy
      position - this is the position in which place the card in the dashboard
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources to pay from warehouse
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player buy more than 6 development cards

    • handleVaticanReport

      protected void handleVaticanReport() throws EndGameException
      this method handle the vatican reports like in the superclass but for only the single player and lorenzoIlMagnifico. At the end it calls checkEndGame to end the game immediately if it needs to be ended
      Overrides:
      handleVaticanReport in class Game
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when a player reach the final vatican report

    • getWinner

      public java.lang.String getWinner()
      this method return the nickname of the winner. in particular, it get the nickname of the player with more victory points, if there are some players with the same number of victory points, the method return the player with more victory points and more resources, if there are some players with the same amount of resources, return a random player. if there is a single game, it gets the single player nickname when his number of cards is >= 7 or if his position reached the last vatican report
      Overrides:
      getWinner in class Game
      Returns:
      the nickname of the winner
